trans-unit.source: Specifies whether a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref> or <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"></xref> control retrieves data as a <xref href="System.Data.IDataReader"></xref> or <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"> </xref> controle recupera dados como um <xref href="System.Data.IDataReader"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The SqlDataSourceMode enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> controls to describe the data retrieval mode that the data source control uses when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: A SqlDataSourceMode enumeração é usada pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>controla para descrever o modo de recuperação de dados controle da fonte de dados é usada quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>método é chamado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A> property is set to DataSet, data is loaded into a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> structure.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>estiver definida como um conjunto de dados, dados são carregados em um <xref:System.Data.DataSet>estrutura.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This enables scenarios where user interface controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> offer sorting and paging capabilities.
trans-unit.target: Isso possibilita cenários em que a interface do usuário controles como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>oferta classificação e paginação recursos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A> property is set to DataReader, data is retrieved by an <xref:System.Data.IDataReader> object, which is a read-only, forward-only cursor.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>estiver definida como DataReader, os dados são recuperados por um <xref:System.Data.IDataReader>objeto, que é um cursor somente leitura, somente encaminhamento.</xref:System.Data.IDataReader> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SqlDataSourceMode enumeration is only used to describe how the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> command retrieves data; it has no effect on other operations the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control performs, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Insert%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Update%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A enumeração SqlDataSourceMode só é usada para descrever como o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>comando recupera dados; ele não tem nenhum efeito em outras operações de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>controle executa, como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Insert%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Update%2A>, ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Update%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves data from the underlying data storage as an <xref href="System.Data.IDataReader"></xref>
trans-unit.target: Recupera dados do armazenamento de dados subjacente, como um<xref href="System.Data.IDataReader"></xref>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves data from the underlying data storage into a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Recupera dados do armazenamento de dados subjacente em uma <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref> estrutura.
